text: god answers the prayers of believers in
christ but there's sometimes one big
roadblock that i call the guilt factor
the bible says that if our heart does
not condemn us god will hear us and
answer us but if our heart accuses us of
sin our faith leaks out and we lose
there's two ways to keep a clean heart
number two if you do be honest with god
about it and know that jesus blood
sacrifice erases your guilt believe that
come learn more at houston faith church
